window.hasSessionStorage = (function(){
    try {
        sessionStorage.setItem('mod', 'mod');
        sessionStorage.removeItem('mod');
        return true;
    } catch(e) {
        return false;
    }
})()
window.setFontConfig = function(active) {
  window.fontConfig = {
    google: {
      families: Object.keys(fonts).map(function(font) {
        return font + ':' + fonts[font].join(',')
      }),
    },
    classes: false,
    active: active,
    timeout: 2000 // Set the timeout to two seconds
  };
}
if (hasSessionStorage && sessionStorage.getItem('hasFonts') || !hasSessionStorage) {
  WebFont.load({
    google: {
      families: Object.keys(fonts).map(function(font) {
        return font + ':' + fonts[font].join(',')
      }),
    },
    active: function() {
      document.documentElement.className += " fonts-stage-2";
      try {
        document.dispatchEvent(new Event("fontsLoaded"));
      } catch (e) {}
    },
    classes: false,
    timeout: 2000 // Set the timeout to two seconds
  });
}
if (hasSessionStorage && !sessionStorage.getItem('hasFonts')) {
  function eff() {
    document.documentElement.className += " fonts-stage-2";
    sessionStorage.setItem('hasFonts', true)
    try {
      document.dispatchEvent(new Event("fontsLoaded"));
    } catch (e) {}
  }
  window.setFontConfig(eff);
  window.swPromise ? window.swPromise.then(function() {WebFont.load(window.fontConfig)}) : WebFont.load(window.fontConfig);
  // WebFont.load(window.fontConfig)
}

}
